title: Halsey is a retro dream as she's seen wearing tie-dye from head to toe ahead of her Halloween party
text:
She's throwing the 'craziest party' she's ever thrown tonight to celebrate Halloween.

But ahead of the big bash on Friday, Halsey was seen at a Urban Outfitters in Los Angeles wearing head to toe tie-dye.

The Without Me singer, 25, looked relaxed in a blue and purple tie-dye shirt and matching sweatpants as she sported a candy Ring Pop on her finger.

Retro dream: Halsey, 25, was seen at a Urban Outfitters in Los Angeles wearing head to toe tie-dye on Friday

Ashley Nicolette Frangipane, known professionally as Halsey, paired the look with neon green socks and white trainers.

She wore her hair up in a messy bun and secured it with a number of colorful hair clips.

Halsey kept her accessories simple, donning a pair of dangly earrings and round retro shades.

The Graveyard singer appeared to have a Band-Aid on her finger as she was photographed heading to her waiting car.

Long hair don't care: The singer wore her hair up in a messy bun and secured it with a number of colorful hair clips

Colorful: Ashley Nicolette Frangipane, known professionally as Halsey, paired the look with neon green socks and white trainers

Simple: Halsey kept her accessories simple, donning a pair of dangly earrings and round retro shades

The singer carried a cup of coffee in one hand, later setting it down to pick up her iPhone 11 pro to share a promo for her Halloween party.

In the promo, posted to her Instagram stories, Halsey wrote that her party, Halsey Presents: Almost Famous, is going to be 'The craziest party. (sic) I've thrown yet.'

The Hollywood bash is invite only and is themed 'Roadtrip through the ages: Rockstars of the 60's, 70's, 80's & 90's.'

Admission is free, but attendees must wear a costume as well as make a 'mandatory donation' to the Los Angeles based homeless youth charity My Friend's Place.

Party time! In the promo, posted to her Instagram stories, Halsey wrote that her party, Halsey Presents: Almost Famous, is going to be 'The craziest party. (sic) I've thrown yet'

No word on the guest list, but it's likely American Horror Story's Evan Peters will attend.

The actor, 32, and the 11 Minutes songstress have been sparking rumors that they are an item.

Evan and Halsey were seen at lunch together at Sweet Butter in Sherman Oaks, California this week, cuddling closely up to one another.

The pair had also been spotted a few weeks ago on day date at Six Flags.

While at Six Flags, a bystander said the duo was 'laughing and flirting the whole time while we waited for the ride, it looked really romantic. It looked like they were having a fun date night.'

Halsey has made her attraction to Evan well known on Twitter over the years.

'Seriously Evan Peters stop making me attracted to alleged sociopaths and accused murderers…' she wrote of the star in 2012, referring to his oft-psychotic characters on American Horror Story.

In 2013 she tweeted: 'Petition for Evan Peters to date me,' and in 2014 she tweeted: 'I’m a f**king liar I’m so in love with Evan Peters I’m so whipped I’m whipped as f**k!'
description: Halsey was seen at a Urban Outfitters in Los Angeles wearing head to toe tie-dye on Friday. The singer, 25, looked relaxed in a blue and purple tie-dye shirt and matching sweatpants.
